page.title: 15EMERGENCY SERVICES
page.content: The fire engine is a small converted van.It goes to all the fires in Harris and the Stornoway Fire Brigade comes to the fires too.There are ten people in the brigade and they are contacted by telephone when there is a fire. There are two policemen in Harris.The crime rate in Harris is very low so there is only need for two policemen. There is one ambulance in Harris with one driver and a standby driver.The ambulance goes to all emergencies in Harris.When there is a serious emergency the ambulance takes the patient to Stornoway.The coastguard is made up of 8 people.the inflatable boat is kept in a shed in Scott Road and when there is an emergency it is towed to the water and launched.It has 2 40hp engines so it will reach an emergency quickly.
